I'm only fiddling with the game, but what a thrill. Really gets your blood flowing in a hyper competitive kind of way. Reminds me of the rush I used to get when I first got into Street Fighter IV.

Even if I'm crap, its still a fun game to watch. Worth it just for getting into the massive amount of competitive gameplay as a spectator.
